thread.title: LIC clocks Rs 16k-cr profit through equity investments in April-Dec 2016 | Business Standard News
thread.title_full: LIC clocks Rs 16k-cr profit through equity investments in April-Dec 2016 | Business Standard News

title: LIC clocks Rs 16k-cr profit through equity investments in April-Dec 2016 | Business Standard News
text: LIC clocks Rs 16k-cr profit through equity investments in April-Dec 2016 Chairman V K Sharma expects Rs 35,000 cr in new business premium by March-end Chairman V K Sharma expects Rs 35,000 cr in new business premium by March-end LIC chairman V K Sharma said net profit in equity market so far this year stands at RS 16,000 crore. He said gross yield on investment was 8.18% in 2016/17. The national insurer said total equity purchase for 2016/17 was Rs 39,000 crore. LIC invested Rs 1.83 lakh crore in government bonds and state development bonds until end Dec 2016. Sharma expects Rs 35,000 crore in new business premium by March-end. Reuters
